Nested Class Summary
static class Help.Format
          A representation of an available LDA result format, comprised of its name, its media type (as a string), and the URL of the "corresponding" page to link to to see it in that representation.

Method Detail

createVelocityEngine

public static org.apache.velocity.app.VelocityEngine createVelocityEngine(Bindings b,
                                                                          com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource config)
Create a new VelocityEngine. Initialise it with properties from the file named by velocityPropertiesFileName, and if that is absent or defines no properties, with a default classpath resource loader. The config resource is currently unused.

labelFor

public static String labelFor(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource r)
Return the "preferred" label of this resource. The definition of "preferred" is:

The lexical form of some literal which is the value of the property skos:prefLabel;

failing that, the lexical form of some literal with no language code which is the value of the property rdfs:label;

failing that, the lexical form of some literal with a language code which is the value of the property rdfs:label;

failing that, the local name of the resource.

labelsFor

public static List<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Literal> labelsFor(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource r)
Answer a list of all the literals which are the objects of skos:prefLabel or rdfs:label, with the skos labels coming first.

getMetadataFrom

public static Map<String,Object> getMetadataFrom(ShortNames shortNames,
                                                 IdMap ids,
                                                 com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m)
Answer a map from metadata item names to Item values. The model's metadata hangs off the wasResultOf value of the displayed Page. The result is a map from pathnames to values, where the pathname is the dot-separated list of shortnames of the properties leading to the value. The terminating values are literals or resources with no properties. Chains involving termBindings or variableBindings are discarded (their content is recorded in the shortnames and varvalues maps produces elsewhere in this class.)

getShortnames

public static ShortNames getShortnames(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m)
Answer a map from Resources (for their URIs) to their String shortname, if any, built from the termBindings in the model's metadata.

getVarsFrom

public static Map<String,WrappedNode> getVarsFrom(ShortNames names,
                                                  IdMap ids,
                                                  com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m)
Answer a map from variable names to their values represented as Items, built from the variableBindings in the model's metadata.

getFormats

public static List<Help.Format> getFormats(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m)
Answer a set of all the formats available, extracted from the DCTerms metadata of the model.
